byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and JEREMY W. PETERS

abstract: Sen Marco Rubio has increasingly offered New Hampshire voters glimpses into his personal life, often in improvised way, as part of his effort to counter criticism that he is too scripted; shift is indication that Rubio acknowledges his mastery of policy is not enough to connect to voters.
lead_paragraph: The senator from Florida, known for his cautious style, has increasingly offered to audiences glimpses into his childhood, his family and his finances.

headline.main: Marco Rubio Turns Toward the Personal on the Campaign Trail
headline.print_headline: Once Cautious in Campaign, Rubio Shows More of His Personal Side

snippet: The senator from Florida, known for his cautious style, has increasingly offered to audiences glimpses into his childhood, his family and his finances.
